meanings.sent1: The new dress she wore to the party was absolutely fabby.
meanings.sent2: The sunset over the ocean was truly fabby.
meanings.sent3: Everyone at the event was dressed fabby, making it a stylish affair.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was so fabby, it seemed to glow with beauty.
meanings.sent5: The garden was transformed into a fabby wonderland with colorful flowers and twinkling lights.

meanings.sent1: She danced fabby across the stage, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent2: The singer performed fabby, hitting every note perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved his wand fabby, creating illusions that amazed the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The chef cooked fabby, creating dishes that delighted the taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer worked fabby, creating stunning outfits for the runway show.
